title: Pixel 2 and 3XL 9.xx 4/5 sec update. Voice to text faster option.... Block offensive words default.
content: Offensive words disabled all settings including assistant. Teated pixel 2 and 3 and XL all our censoring my potty mouth. Came around to invite me to talk faster and if I want to talk faster I can't swear. Once I turn it back to normal then it says anything I want in speech.
